mapper.insert: INSERT INTO article SET regDate = NOW(), updateDate = NOW(), memberId = #{memberId}, title = #{title}, `body` = #{body}
mapper.select: SELECT A.*, M.nickName AS extra__Writer FROM article AS A INNER JOIN `member` AS M ON M.id = A.memberId ORDER BY A.id DESC
SELECT A.*, M.nickName AS extra__Writer FROM article AS A INNER JOIN `member` AS M ON M.id = A.memberId WHERE A.id = #{id}
